channel.title: Currently trying to Make a sever with someone, I will host!
channel.description: I can host the server 24/7, typically want to do a 317 but if someone wants to do a 718 or something and knows how to code one than Id be all in. But I will host and I have teamviewer so you can code thru that on my computer aswell as I can watch and learn that way too. Eventually when donations come in we can do vps but I don't want any of the donations so you could use your paypal. My Skype is Skittles.harr0x
